permissions.PushMessages:create: 创建与推送消息相关的数据
permissions.PushMessages:read: 查看与推送消息相关的数据
permissions.PushMessages:update: 更新与推送消息相关的数据
permissions.PushMessages:delete: 删除与推送消息相关的数据

PushMessages.FCM.Enable.title: Firebase云消息（FCM）激活
PushMessages.FCM.Enable.description: 启用/禁用Firebase云消息（FCM）。需要额外配置。使用以下链接进行配置 https://docs.virtocommerce.org/platform/user-guide/push-messages/firebase-cloud-messaging/

PushMessages.BatchSize.title: 批量大小
PushMessages.BatchSize.description: 定义每批发送的消息数量

PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.ApiKey.title: ApiKey
PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.ApiKey.description: 授权您的应用访问Firebase服务

PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.AuthDoma.title: AuthDomain
PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.AuthDoma.description: 设置一个域名，用于处理您的Firebase项目的身份验证请求

PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.ProjectI.title: ProjectId
PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.ProjectI.description: 命名您的Firebase项目，以便将所有Firebase服务链接到一个项目下

PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.StorageB.title: StorageBucket
PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.StorageB.description: 设置您的Firebase云存储的URL，项目相关的文件可以存储在此处

PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.Messagin.title: MessagingSenderId
PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.Messagin.description: 设置ID以识别发送者，并将消息从您的Firebase项目发送到用户设备

PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.AppId.title: AppId
PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.AppId.description: 将消息链接到您的特定应用程序

PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.VapidKey.title: VapidKey
PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.VapidKey.description: 设置用于Web推送协议的密钥，以帮助验证从您的应用程序发送的基于Web的推送消息

PushMessages.SendScheduledMessagesRecurr.title: 计划消息的定期任务
PushMessages.SendScheduledMessagesRecurr.description: 启用/禁用计划消息发送任务

PushMessages.SendScheduledMessagesRecurr.title: 计划消息定期任务的Cron表达式
PushMessages.SendScheduledMessagesRecurr.description: 配置以安排自动消息。'0/5****'表示每5分钟发送一次消息

PushMessages.TrackNewRecipientsRecurring.title: 跟踪新接收者的定期任务
PushMessages.TrackNewRecipientsRecurring.description: 启用/禁用接收者跟踪任务

PushMessages.TrackNewRecipientsRecurring.title: 跟踪新接收者定期任务的Cron表达式
PushMessages.TrackNewRecipientsRecurring.description: 配置以检查新接收者。'0 0/1'表示每分钟发送一次消息
